text: @realDonaldTrump @HARRISFAULKNER @FoxNews Opportunities abound. COVID19 was your ticket to a landslide 2nd term. You didn’t see the chance to unite our country and the threat to America. Found it easier to destroy. You lack the courage of a leader. You squandered historic opportunities to be great. Your ego betrayed you.
